title: #466 Guide Me To Hell with Katie Hannigan
itunes:title: Guide Me To Hell with Katie Hannigan
description:
Katie Hannigan sits down with me to tell me about her time as a NYC tour guide. It was a tawdry world of autistic tourist nerds and their dumb families. 

Make sure to check out Katie’s new standup comedy album, “Feeling of Emptiness” and listen to her podcast, “Lady Journey” that she does with Sarah Tollemache every week.

For more Ari: 

  • Subscribe on YouTube
  • Listen to Skeptic Tank
  • Tour Dates 
  • Instagram - @arishaffir 
  • Patreon 
  • Cool merch & more

For more Katie Hannigan: 

  • Listen to Katie’s new album: Feeling of Emptiness
  • Check out Lady Journey Podcast: @LadyJourneyPodcast
  • Instagram - @katiehanniganforever
  • Twitter - @katiehannigan 

The Music:

Caitlin Rose - Tour Guide

Peter Fenn - Tour Guide

The Libertines - What Katie Did 

The Band - Katie’s Been Gone

 

Thanks to our sponsors! Go to YoKratom.com the home of the $60 kilo! And visit 3Chi.com for 5% off with code "Ari".
